Wisdom: أَكْثَرُ الصَّلَاحِ وَالصَّوَابِ فِي صُحْبَةِ أُولِي النُّهَى وَالْأَلْبَابِ
enWisdom: It is better and more appropriate to associate with people of wisdom and intelligence

Wisdom: صَاحِبِ الْعُقَلَاءَ تَغْنَمْ وَأَعْرِضْ عَنِ الدُّنْيَا تَسْلَمْ
enWisdom: Accompany the intelligent and you will benefit, turn away from this world and you will be safe

Wisdom: صَاحِبِ الْعُقَلَاءَ وَجَالِسِ الْعُلَمَاءَ وَاغْلِبِ الْهَوَى تُرَافِقِ الْمَلَأَ الْأَعْلَى
enWisdom: Accompany the intelligent, associate with the learned and overcome your vain desires, [by this] you will join the company of the Exalted Assembly
Accompanying a wise friend enlivens the soul

Wisdom: عَلَيْكَ بِمُقَارَنَةِ ذِي الْعَقْلِ وَالدِّينِ فَإِنَّهُ خَيْرُ الْأَصْحَابِ
enWisdom: You should accompany the one who is intelligent and devout, for surely he is the best of companions
Associate with the people of excellence and you will gain felicity and nobility

Wisdom: عِمَارَةُ الْقُلُوبِ فِي مُعَاشَرَةِ ذَوِي الْعُقُولِ
enWisdom: The development of the hearts is in socializing with people of intellect
There is nothing that brings one closer to good and keeps one safer from evil than keeping company with the righteous
The companionship of a wise person is dependable
